About Me

I’m a data scientist and passionate entrepreneur with background in astronomy. Experienced in statistical models with Python and relevant libraries ( scikit-learn, Numpy, Pandas, TenserFlow, etc.). Skilled in implementing A/B testing and Machine Learning solutions to solve business problems. Reinforcement learning enthusiast. Extensive background in entrepreneurship. Rock climber, skier and yoga junkie.

Projects

Predicting user’s demographics

http://tiny.cc/pred_demog

Using a dataset from China’s largest third-party mobile data platform, TalkingData, the objective was to predict user’s demographics characteristics which in return gives us valuable information that can help millions of developers and brand advertisers pursue data-driven marketing efforts which are relevant to their users and catered to their preferences.

Determining Telco Churning

http://tiny.cc/telco_churn

Training and testing data from 7042 customers from a Telco with eight different supervised models, the script was able to predict customer churn with a 78 % accuracy. The algorithm also determined the most important features and variables that influence this churn, and who are most likely to leave or stay at the given moment.

Author detection

The goal of this project is to train a model with texts from different authors, and determine the accuracy of the model when predicting from which author a new text belongs.
